message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not comfortable going as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $100. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was really hoping to get a better deal. Can you do $95?
I'm not willing to go as low as $95, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I'll offer it to you for $105. It's a fair price, considering the product's value to you is $120. What do you think?
I understand you're trying to make a compromise, but I'm still a bit above the value I'm willing to pay. Can you meet me at $98?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $98. I'll meet you at $108, but that's as low as I can go. It's still a good deal for you, considering the product's value to you is $120.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $108, but I'm still not comfortable with that price. I'm willing to go up to $105, but no more. Can you meet me at that price?
